function.name: stock_cash_flow_sheet_by_report_em
function.description: 东方财富-股票-财务分析-现金流量表-按报告期

extra.limit: 单次获取指定 symbol 的现金流量表-按报告期数据

examples.code:
接口示例

```python
import akshare as ak

stock_cash_flow_sheet_by_report_em_df = ak.stock_cash_flow_sheet_by_report_em(symbol="SH600519")
print(stock_cash_flow_sheet_by_report_em_df)
```
